item.title: The six-port USB desktop charger solves all your charging problems
item.description:
Poweradd, a company known for its mobile device accessories, has introduced a new six-port desktop USB charger with a 50W capacity. This charger is designed to meet the growing demand for charging multiple devices simultaneously when outlets are limited. The compact charger measures 4" x 2.9" x 1" and supports voltages from 100V to 240V, making it suitable for international use. It features two ports that provide 2.4A, two ports with 2...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-six-port-usb-desktop-charger-solves-all-your-charging-problems/

item.title: Concentrating on Kickstarter: Making Solar Power Accessible to Everyone
item.description:
Spor Solar Charges aims to make convenient solar-powered battery charging accessible to everyone. Their product, Spor, is a portable battery charger for USB devices that can recharge itself using solar energy. It can also be powered up using a standard AC outlet. The company claims that Spor can charge multiple devices simultaneously and replenish a phone’s battery almost as quickly as a wall outlet, according to their Kickstarter page. Source: Kickstarter...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/concentrating-on-kickstarter-making-solar-power-accessible-to-everyone/
